string.value: Lisa of Orbis made me a horn flute. Hopefully this will help me finally understand what Moppie is saying ...
Should I try this horn flute on Moppie?
I used the horn flute for fairies on Moppie, and I could finally understand what he's saying!!
Let's see what happens when a human uses the fairy's horn flute, I don't know how it'll react to humans using it, so there's no guarantee it'll work, but ... do you still want to try it?
Alright, then go up to Moppie and play the horn flute in front of him. I don't know if the fairies will like the idea of a human playing it, though...
You took so much time and effort to acquire the horn flute, and now you don't want to help Moppie out? Are you really THAT afraid of the fairies?
(When the horn flute starts to be played, a soothing sound echoes throughout the area while the horn flute disappears in a puff) Hey, it's ... gone! Is that because I'm a human?
Did I do all this for naught? \n#bHey can you hear me, bark bark~?#k\n Hey, isn't this Moppie talking? ... It IS!! I can clearly understand Moppie now!
Okay, now I can understand what Moppie's saying!! But ... what??
You still haven't used it? Don't be scared. Try it.
